name: Slide (gindia)
description:
5 short levels!

Controls :

WASD  to move R to reset level.

Slide is a tiny puzzle game. the player have a limited number of moves to reach the green circle. try to complete all 5 levels.  

Credits:

main music loop https://www.looperman.com/loops/detail/222775/sad-nostalgic-piano-76bpm-lo-fi-pi...

hit sound effect  https://freesound.org/people/carlmartin/sounds/158925/
